mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Products (product_name, price, category, quantity_available, last_update) VALUES (#{product_name}, #{price}, #{category}, 100, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(product_id) AS product_id, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM ( SELECT product_id, price FROM Products ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT #{count} ) AS temp_table
